description: Over on the east side of the island is a huge stand of tall rubbertrees--a huge forest of them. Steve Cruz and Blake Nolan are hikingthrough the dense green foliage as they explore the island. Afterhours of trekking, they are lost, surrounded by rubber trees on everyside. As they rest beneath the thick canopy of green,they think abouttheir future and their fate. Somehow testosterone takes over as theybegin to study each other's perfect, hairy chests. Steve, a new face inporn, is a top's perfect bottom--small and tight, hairy and fit, stunningto look at...Blake is a bottom's perfect top--over six feet tall, huge and masculine,hairy, strong and confident. We guarantee that this scene will becomean instant classic and will become a favorite for men around thenation! Steve Cruz makes a hell of a debut, put thru the paces by thetowering master, Blake Nolan.
title: Lords Of The Jungle, Scene #04
